content: Hi, I'm scheduling a meeting with the department head for our new curriculum implementation. Can you please send me an invitation?
I've sent you an invitation to meet with Dr. Smith at 2 PM on Friday. Please let me know if you need any modifications.
Great, thank you! I'd like to review the curriculum report before the meeting, can you send it over?
The curriculum report is attached to this email. Also, please let me know if you need any accommodations for students with special needs.
I've reviewed the report and have some questions regarding the new assessment methods. Can we discuss that during the meeting?
Absolutely, I'll make sure to bring up those points during our discussion. By the way, did you receive the latest updates on the standardized testing schedule?
